trans-unit.source: Please choose the language to use during the installation of Siwapp
trans-unit.target: Molimo odaberite jezik za nastavak instalacije Siwapp-a

trans-unit.source: If any of these items are highlighted in red then please take actions to correct them
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko imate crvene oznake, molimo da poduzmete potrebne akcije da ih ispravite

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so could lead to your Siwapp installation not functioning correctly
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko dođe do neuspjeha moguće je da instalacija Siwapp-a ne funkcionira kako treba

trans-unit.source: These settings are recommended for PHP in order to ensure full compatibility with Siwapp
trans-unit.target: Podešenja su preporučena za PHP da bi osigurali potpunu kompatibilnost sa Siwapp-om

trans-unit.source: However, Siwapp will still operate if your settings do not quite match the recommended
trans-unit.target: Siwapp će i dalje biti funkcionalan iako Vaše postavke se ne slažu sa preporučenima

trans-unit.source: Enter your database connection details below.
trans-unit.target: Ispod trebate upisati informacije za konekciju na bazu

trans-unit.source: If you're not sure about these, contact your host.
trans-unit.target: Ako niste sigurni za ispravnost informacija, kontaktirajte Vašeg host administratora

trans-unit.source: php.ini has zend.ze1_compatibility_mode set to off
trans-unit.target: u php.ini je zend.ze1_compatibility_mode parametar deaktiviran (off)

trans-unit.source: Set zend.ze1_compatibility_mode to off in php.ini ([1])
trans-unit.target: Podesite zend.ze1_compatibility_mode na off u php.ini ([1])

trans-unit.source: Install PDO (mandatory for Propel and Doctrine)
trans-unit.target: Instalirajte PDO (potreban za Propel i Doctrine)

trans-unit.source: Install PDO drivers (mandatory for Propel and Doctrine)
trans-unit.target: Instalirajte drivere za PDO (potreban za Propel i Doctrine)

trans-unit.source: Install the PHP-XML module (required by Propel)
Install the XSL module (recommended for Propel)
Install a PHP accelerator like APC (highly recommended)
trans-unit.target: Instalirajte PHP akcelerator APC (snažno se preporuča)

trans-unit.source: php.ini has safe_mode set to off
trans-unit.target: u php.ini je safe_mode namješten na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has short_open_tag set to off
trans-unit.target: u php.ini je short_open_tag namješteno na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has magic_quotes_gpc set to off
trans-unit.target: u php.ini je magic_quotes_gpc namješten na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has register_globals set to off
trans-unit.target: u php.ini je register_globals namješten na off

trans-unit.source: php.ini has session.auto_start set to off
trans-unit.target: u php.ini je session.auto_start namješten na off

trans-unit.source: Set safe_mode to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Podesite safe_mode na "off" u Vašoj php.ini datoteci

trans-unit.source: Set short_open_tag to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Podesite short_open_tag na "off" u Vašoj php.ini datoteci

trans-unit.source: Set magic_quotes_gpc to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Podesite magic_quotes_gpc na "off" u Vašoj php.ini datoteci

trans-unit.source: Set register_globals to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Podesite register_globals na "off" u Vašoj php.ini datoteci

trans-unit.source: Set session.auto_start to off in php.ini
trans-unit.target: Podesite session.auto_start na "off" u Vašoj php.ini datoteci

trans-unit.source: is Free Software released under the MIT license
trans-unit.target: je besplatan software pod MIT licencom

trans-unit.source: Can't connect to the database. Please review the data.
trans-unit.target: Nemoguće se spojiti na bazu. Provjerite podatke.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following information for the super administrator user:
trans-unit.target: Unesite sljedeće podatke za super administratora:

trans-unit.source: If you want to preload the database with sample data, check the following checkbox.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko želite predefinirane podatke molimo da označite checkbox.

trans-unit.source: Click the "Finish" button to start the Siwapp application.
trans-unit.target: Kliknite na "Završi" za startanje Siwapp aplikacije

trans-unit.source: Please review the following error messages carefully and try to correct them before you continue.
trans-unit.target: Molimo da pažljivo pregledate sljedeće greške te ih pokušate popraviti što prije.

trans-unit.source: Siwapp needs to have write permissions over certain files and directories
trans-unit.target: Siwapp mora imati dozvolu za pisanje nad određenim datotekama i direktorijima

trans-unit.source: Once you've checked out the instructions above, click the "Finish" button to finish the installation process.
trans-unit.target: Kada ste provjerili instrukcije iznad, kliknite na "Završi" za završetak instalacije.

trans-unit.source: We couldn't write to %1% file. Please download it %2%here%3% and replace it at %4% by yourself
trans-unit.target: Ne možemo pisati po %1% datoteci. Molimo skinite ih %2%ovdje%3% isami ih zamjenite sa %4%

trans-unit.source: PLEASE TAKE THE FOLLOWING SECURITY MEASURES:
Remove the write permissions of the %1% file
trans-unit.target: Maknite dozvole za pisanje na %1% datoteci

trans-unit.source: There were some sql errors creating the database.
trans-unit.target: Imamo nekoliko SQL grešaka prilikom kreiranja baze

trans-unit.source: The %1% directory exists and is writable
trans-unit.target: Direktorij %1% postoji i omogućeno je pisanje

trans-unit.source: Make sure the %1% directory is writable (%2%)
trans-unit.target: Osigurajte da direktorij %1% ima dozvole za pisanje (%2%)

trans-unit.source: There are some tables at your database that will be overwritten by the Siwapp installation process
You need to click the checkbox to allow the tables to be overwritten
The mod_rewrite apache module is available
